Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,486 @@ +import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; +import { Calendar, Clock, User, FileText, AlertTriangle, Phone, Shield, Heart, CheckCircle, XCircle, Plus, Bell, Search, Filter, MessageSquare, Users, Home } from 'lucide-react'; + +import AppointmentsManagement from "../components/AdminComponents/AppointmentManagement.jsx"; + +const GBVLawyerDashboard = () => { + const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('dashboard'); + const [showAppointmentModal, setShowAppointmentModal] = useState(false); + + const [appointments, setAppointments] = useState([ + { + id: 'A001', + clientName: 'Sarah M.', + type: 'Initial Consultation', + date: '2025-09-08', + time: '10:00 AM', + location: 'Office - Safe Room', + notes: 'First meeting - trauma-informed approach' + }, + { + id: 'A002', + clientName: 'Maria L.', + type: 'Court Preparation', + date: '2025-09-10', + time: '2:00 PM', + location: 'Video Call (Secure)', + notes: 'Review testimony, safety planning' + }, + { + id: 'A003', + clientName: 'New Client', + type: 'Intake Assessment', + date: '2025-09-09', + time: '11:30 AM', + location: 'Office - Safe Room', + notes: 'Emergency referral from shelter' + } + ]); + + const [resources] = useState([ + { name: 'Crisis Hotline', number: '1-800-799-7233', available: '24/7' }, + { name: 'Local Shelter', number: '(555) 123-4567', available: 'Always Open' }, + { name: 'Counseling Services', number: '(555) 987-6543', available: 'M-F 9-5' }, + { name: 'Legal Aid', number: '(555) 456-7890', available: 'M-F 8-6' } + ]); + + const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { + switch (priority) { + case 'Critical': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-50'; + case 'High': return 'text-orange-600 bg-orange-50'; + case 'Medium': return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-50'; + default: return 'text-green-600 bg-green-50'; + } + }; + + const getSafetyColor = (level) => { + if (level.includes('High')) return 'text-red-600 bg-red-50'; + if (level.includes('Medium')) return 'text-orange-600 bg-orange-50'; + return 'text-green-600 bg-green-50'; + }; + + const DashboardOverview = () => ( +
